analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0xcf2fe3f2dcaa158e0e41a204f053adc12949b768.sol:
	Contract ChataboxToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0xcf2fe3f2dcaa158e0e41a204f053adc12949b768.sol#93)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0xcf2fe3f2dcaa158e0e41a204f053adc12949b768.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/5/0xcf2fe3f2dcaa158e0e41a204f053adc12949b768.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_spender' of ChataboxToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/5/0xcf2fe3f2dcaa158e0e41a204f053adc12949b768.sol#188-189) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of ChataboxToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/5/0xcf2fe3f2dcaa158e0e41a204f053adc12949b768.sol#189) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of ChataboxToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/5/0xcf2fe3f2dcaa158e0e41a204f053adc12949b768.sol#207-208) is not in mixedCase
